summary: The team clarified that no sprints have been executed yet, confirming only SP-003 as the active sprint for Leave Management, while earlier sprints SP-001 and SP-002 remain in planning without progress. Mike proposed options to reset or prioritize foundational sprints like SP-001 for authentication and Supabase, and sought the client's preference on proceeding.

actions.task: Provide preference on sprint order: pause SP-003 to start SP-001, proceed with SP-003, or adjust scope

backlog_deltas.title: Reset status from 'in progress' to planned, as no execution has started
Reset status from 'in progress' to planned, as no execution has started
Confirmed as the only active sprint for US-003 and US-005

risks.risk: Potential dependency issues if SP-003 proceeds without foundational auth and Supabase from SP-001
risks.mitigation: Prioritize executing SP-001 first or monitor AI team to handle dependencies logically
